name: One Touch Block
description:
GMTK game jam 2019 entry.

Proceed through levels by opening and then reaching the exit portal.

BUT, you can ONLY touch each block ONCE!

Controls (keys):
Left (a / left arrow)
Right (d / right arrow)
Jump (w / up arrow / space)

Author: Gregor Kužnik
Project repository: https://github.com/gregorkuznik/gmtk-game-jam-2019
